summary:
Adds a book to Helgen Keep and Delphine\'s hideout which when read will 
prompt the player if they want to add dragon map markers.
descriptionHtml:
Description
----------------
This mods adds a book called \"Dragon Burial Sites\" to Helgen Keep and Sleeping
Giant Inn (Delphine\'s hideout). When touching the book the user is asked whether
they wish to add map markers to their map. This happens two times. First for 
vanilla map markers, then for the Dovahkriid map markers. The message has four
options.
Yes.............: adds hidden map markers to the map
Yes(fast-travel): adds map markers that are already discovered
No..............: do nothing
No(disable).....: this will call the disable function on the map markers, making them invisible. If you disable the markers, they will not appear on the map even if you travel to that location.  

After placing the book in your inventory and answering to the questions, they 
will no longer appear and the book will display as any other book. To get the
messages one more time, drop the book on the ground and activate it. 

Supported Dragons
--------------------------
All vanilla except the ones in Blackreach and Labyrintian.
Dovahkriid dragons.

Acknowledgement
-------------------------
The bulk of the text in the book is from uesp.net
author: tox2ik
